entry.title: Combined summary - Testing and reviewing requested for work on Bitcoin Core wallet
entry.summary: Cozz Lovan has been working on improving Bitcoin Core's wallet code recently, with changes including subtracting fees from amounts, improving ReorderTransactions, replacing OrderedTxItems with an in-memory map, and calling checkBalanceChanged() periodically instead of for every updated transaction. Other changes involve moving g_signals.SetBestChain below SyncWithWallets, calling SetBestChain before and after rescanning, and not flushing the wallet in AddToWalletIfInvolvingMe(). To ensure that these changes can be implemented in the upcoming version 0.10, anyone interested in the performance of Bitcoin Core's wallet is encouraged to help test and review the improvements.
